Package taskBoard

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ExecuteOperation
    This class executes the operation based on user input if it is valid, such as create, move, update and complete functions
    Main
    This is the main class that user interacts with, it fist predefined the correct command lines that could be used to complete the work, then it accepts the user input command lines, and call check() method to compare user input with predefined command lines.
    Option
    The Options class is the core part for verifying user input command line, by calling the method check()
    OptionData
    This class creates an option instance to hold all the information of a single option.
    OptionSet
    This class creates an option set instance to group multiple options
    StoryData
    This class holds the information of each created task
    TaskData
    This class holds the information of each created task
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Multiplicity
    An enum contains the multiplicity of an option keyword.
    Prefix
    An enum contains the prefix added in front of the option keyword.
    Separator
    An enum contains the separator between arguments in an user input command line.
    storyStatus
    An enum contains the status of a story Its status is always INCOMPLETE when a new story is created
    taskStatus
    An enum contains the status of a task Its status is always TODO when a new task is created
